title: [Large-Scale] Virtual Reality-Based Clinical Decision-Making Training Program for Physical Therapy

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of Basic Physical Therapy Theory and Anatomy
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining VR simulations with traditional practical training

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose clinical issues in upper-limb musculoskeletal patients with 80% accuracy in VR simulation environments.
Learners can systematize explanations of clinical decision-making processes into three or more stages after standard patient simulations and VR training.
Learners can compose a metacognitive decision-making reflection report after VR simulation training

resources: Upper limb musculoskeletal patient simulation software

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
